title: Version Control System
description: Enel Data School course about git, the most popular version control system.

courses.title: Version Control System: Basics
courses.description: This scenario will teach you the basic operations to control the time evolution of a project

courses.title: Version Control Systems: Branching
courses.description: This scenario will teach you what branches are in git, and how to work with them

courses.title: Version Control System: Working with remotes
courses.description: This scenario will teach you how to sync your repository with its remote instances

courses.title: Version Control System: web collaboration tools
courses.description: This scenario demonstrates how to use Bitbucket to coordinate the work of many developers
